author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE CONDITIONS AND DESTRUCTIVE STORM SURGE EXPECTED ON JAMAICA BY TONIGHT... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA ALSO EXPECTED...
summary: ...HURRICANE CONDITIONS AND DESTRUCTIVE STORM SURGE EXPECTED ON JAMAICA BY TONIGHT... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES IN PORTIONS OF JAMAICA AND SOUTHERN HISPANIOLA ALSO EXPECTED... As of 2:00 AM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.3, -77.7 with movement W at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 926 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

As of 2:00 AM EDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Melissa was located near 16.3, -77.7 with movement W at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 926 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 150 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
